markdownRemark.html:
We decided to give our coffee table away. It seems like a small change, but it really affects how we interact with our space. The open carpet area now encourages us to sit and crawl with the baby, something we want to do more.

Luckily, it was easy for me to part with this piece of furniture. When we moved in, a certain someone wanted a coffee table that was low enough to comfortably rest his feet on while watching television. All I cared about was a combination of aesthetics and practicality: “Just pick something that looks nice. Bonus points for some hidden storage.”

Goodbye, coffee table. For now this decision makes sense for us.
